title: I dont get it how Riot bans a player because another kid Draven decides to take all the kills

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

body:
Please explain me why i got banned because i wanted the game to be lost because one Draven decides to go Top on my lane and steal all mi kills.
At this point we had a Mid laner,a Jungler and 2 adc and 2 supp one of wich was a kid Draven playing adc top with me Darius supp.
Now please Riot explain me why i got banned for 14 days. This is my first game in which i troll and not because for no reason.
People want to ruin my game when i play just for fun taking all my kills. 
So Riot what do you expect me to do,play Darius as second supp on top lane??
Thank you for the 14 day ban and giving that 9y old Draven a good game. Thank you!

> Please explain me why i got banned because i wanted the game to be lost

you explained it

You blatantly intentionally fed from minute one, so don't feed us some bullshit story about retaliating against your teammates. Not that that would have made it any better.

Thanks for posting this, though. It's always nice to see Riot catch intentional feeders.
he took all your kills yet you are 0/18/1 ...... this mean you only damage 1 champion that died the whole match

Can't steal any kill you don't have support damage/cc in

Well the game was a 6v4, with OP actively playing against his own team. Hope they enjoy knowing that typing a single wrong world in chat can lose them their account for good from now on.
Seems like OP was banned for gameplay, which means that unless they had a 14 day punishment for verbal as well; they would nky be permed for verbal. Two different punishment tracts.

> Now please Riot explain me why i got banned for 14 days. This is my first game in which i troll and not because for no reason.
> Thank you for the 14 day ban

If you troll, you get banned.  First troll = first ban.  Riot doesn't care about your stupid excuse.  You can send in a support ticket but you will get a similar response.

> Please explain me why i got banned because i wanted the game to be lost 

This, right here is enough for a punishment. You must try to win, trying to lose is considered griefing. Also, as others  said, intentionally feeding is also a problem. Two (huge) strikes in one game? Not surprised you got punished. I am surprised that you weren't elevated to a permanent ban.

"why did I get banned for intentionally feeding"
